ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This study was supported by the National Science and Technology Major Project of China (2013ZX10004202) and Science and Technology Project of Shaanxi Province (2015SF187). We would like to acknowledge the staff of Hand, Foot and Mouth Disease Surveillance program in the Xiâ€™an, Tongchuan, Baoji, Xianyang, Weinan, Yanan, Hanzhong, Ankang, Shangluo and Yunlin Citys Center for Disease Control and Prevention for collecting the HFMD clinical samples used in this study.
